titleInfo.title: Ben Smathers and the Stoney Mountain Cloggers Press Release

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: A black and white negative describing the history and accomplishments of Ben Smathers and the Stoney Mountain Cloggers, available for bookings through Moeller Talent, Inc. The press release describes the group, the style of "clog" dancing, Smathers' personal life, and his success. The missing section of the negative probably featured a photograph of the dance group. The negative would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
